testcase.classname: User should be able to register successfully using required fields
testcase.name: User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to register page.......................................passed When user enter Fisrtname, lastname, email and password.....................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then user could register successfully.......................................passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to login successfully
testcase.name: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user enter valid email and password....................................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to login successfully
testcase.name: User could not log in with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user enter invalid email and password..................................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then user could not login successfully......................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to reset his password
testcase.name: user can reset his password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to login page..........................................passed When user clicks on Forgot password?........................................passed And enter his email address.................................................passed Then user should be able to recieve a success message.......................passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.name: user can search using product name
testcase.system-out: When user clicks on search field............................................passed And user search with "laptop"...............................................passed Then user can find "laptop" relative results................................passed

testcase.name: user can search using product name 2
testcase.system-out: When user clicks on search field............................................passed And user search with "nike".................................................passed Then user can find "nike" relative results..................................passed

testcase.system-out: When user clicks on search field............................................passed And user search with "SCI_FAITH"............................................passed Then user find "SCI_FAITH" inside product detail page.......................passed

testcase.name: user can search for product using sku 2
testcase.system-out: When user clicks on search field............................................passed And user search with "APPLE_CAM"............................................passed Then user find "APPLE_CAM" inside product detail page.......................passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.name: user can search for product using sku 3
testcase.system-out: When user clicks on search field............................................passed And user search with "SF_PRO_11"............................................passed Then user find "SF_PRO_11" inside product detail page.......................passed

testcase.name: user can select Euro currency
testcase.system-out: When user selects Euro option...............................................passed Then Euro symbol is displayed on all products...............................passed
